darkstarsheart.name: Dark Star's Heart
darkstarsheart.bonus: Wearer is also a Dark Star.

thiefsgloves.name: Thieves Gloves
thiefsgloves.bonus: At the beginning of each planning phase, the wearer equips 2 temporary items. Temporary items increase in power based on your player level.

handofjustice.name: Hand of Justice
handofjustice.bonus: At the beginning of each planning phase, the wearer gains one of the following: Basic Attacks and Spells deal +50% Damage or Basic Attacks heal 50 Health on-hit.

jeweledgauntlet.name: Jeweled Gauntlet
jeweledgauntlet.bonus: The wearer's spells can critically strike.

quicksilver.name: Quicksilver
quicksilver.bonus: [UNIQUE] The wearer is immune to Crowd Control for the first 15 seconds.

shroudofstillness.name: Shroud of Stillness
shroudofstillness.bonus: When combat begins, increases enemies straight ahead's max Mana by 40% until they cast.

trapclaw.name: Trap Claw
trapclaw.bonus: Blocks the first enemy spell that hits them and stun target for 4 seconds.

forceofnature.name: Force of Nature
forceofnature.bonus: Wearer's team gains +1 maximum team size.

bloodthirster.name: Bloodthirster
bloodthirster.bonus: Basic Attacks heal the wearer for 35% of the damage dealt.

runaanshurricane.name: Runaan's hurricane
runaanshurricane.bonus: Basic Attacks fire an additional missile, dealing 70% of the wearer's Attack damage and applying on-hit effects.

starguardianscharm.name: Star Guardian's Charm
starguardianscharm.bonus: Wearer is also a Star Guardian.

dragonsclaw.name: Dragon's Claw
dragonsclaw.bonus: Wearer gains 50% resistance to magic damage.

frozenheart.name: Frozen Heart
frozenheart.bonus: Reduces the Attack Speed of nearby enemies by 50%.

guardianangel.name: Guardian Angel
guardianangel.bonus: When the wearer dies, revive with 400 Health after a 2 second delay.

guinsoosrageblade.name: Guinsoo's Rageblade
guinsoosrageblade.bonus: Basic Attacks grant +5% stacking bonus Attack Speed.

hextechgunblade.name: Hextech Gunblade
hextechgunblade.bonus: Basic Attacks and spells heal the wearer for 25% of the damage dealt.

chaliceoffavor.name: Chalice of Favor
chaliceoffavor.bonus: Whenever the holder casts a spell, gives all nearby allies 10 mana.

ionicspark.name: Ionic Spark
ionicspark.bonus: Enemies within 2 hexes that casts take magic damage equal to 225% of their max Mana. Reduces nearby enemies' Magic Resistance by 50%.

locketoftheironsolari.name: Locket of the Iron Solari
locketoftheironsolari.bonus: When combat begins, all allies within 2 hexes in the same row gain a 250/275/350 shield for 8 seconds.

deathblade.name: Death Blade
deathblade.bonus: Contributing to a kill grants +30 Attack Damage for the remainder of combat. This effect can stack any number of times.

ludensecho.name: Luden's Echo
ludensecho.bonus: When the wearer deals damage with their spell, the first target hit and up to 3 nearby enemies are dealt an additional 150/175/225 ★ magic damage.

morellonomicon.name: Morellonomicon
morellonomicon.bonus: On Spell hit, burn 27% of the target's Maximum Health as true damage over 10 seconds and reducing healing by 30%.

rabadonsdeathcap.name: Rabadon's Deathcap
rabadonsdeathcap.bonus: All sources of Spell Power are 50% more effective.

redbuff.name: Red Buff
redbuff.bonus: Basic Attacks burn 27% of the target's Maximum Health as true damage over 10 seconds and reducing healing by 30%.

redemption.name: Redemption
redemption.bonus: Wearer heals entire team for 800 health on death.

seraphsembrace.name: Seraph's Embrace
seraphsembrace.bonus: After casting their spell, the wearer restores 20 Mana.

spearofshojin.name: Spear of Shojin
spearofshojin.bonus: After casting their spell, the wearer's Basic Attacks restore 18% of their max Mana.

statikkshiv.name: Statikk Shiv
statikkshiv.bonus: Every third Basic Attack from the wearer deals 80 magical damage to 3/4/5 ★ enemies.

swordbreaker.name: Sword Breaker
swordbreaker.bonus: Basic Attacks have a 25% chance to disarm the target for 3 seconds.

giantslayer.name: Giant Slayer
giantslayer.bonus: The wearer's basic attacks deal an additional 12% of the target's current health as physical damage.

zzrotportal.name: Zz'Rot Portal
zzrotportal.bonus: When the wearer dies, a Construct with 1000/2000/3000★ Health arises to continue the fight.

warmogsarmor.name: Warmog's Armor
warmogsarmor.bonus: Wearer regenerates 5% of their missing Health per second.

zekesherald.name: Zeke's Herald
zekesherald.bonus: When combat begins, all allies within 1 hex in the same row gain +30% Attack Speed.

zephyr.name: Zephyr
zephyr.bonus: When combat begins, remove enemy target on the opposite side of the arena for 5 seconds.

bramblevest.name: Bramble Vest
bramblevest.bonus: Negates bonus damage from critical hits. On being hit by a Basic Attack, deal 100/140/200 magic damage to nearby enemies (every 1s max).

lastwhisper.name: Last Whisper
lastwhisper.bonus: [UNIQUE] Critical hits reduce the target's Armor by 90% for 3 seconds. This effect does not stack.

titansresolve.name: Titan's Resolve
titansresolve.bonus: When hit or inflicts a critical hit, gain 2% damage stacking bonus. At 50 stacks, gain 25 Armor and Magic Resistance.
